ross-howard-jones.name: Ross Howard Jones
ross-howard-jones.about: Is a User Interface Designer and photography enthusiast who lives in Vancouver, BC.

brock-whitten.name: Brock Whitten
brock-whitten.about: Author of Harp and Co-Creator of @PhoneGap. Mozilla-WebFWD Alumni and advocate of Open Web Standards.

rob-ellis.name: Rob Ellis
rob-ellis.about: Co-Founder of HarpPlatorm, Chloi Inc, WebFWD Alumni. Co-Creator of PhoneGap, Making the Web better.
